title: Billy Joe Saunders will make his US bow in Los Angeles against Argentine Marcelo Esteban Cocores
text:
Billy Joe Saunders will face the undefeated Argentinian Marcelo Esteban Coceres on his American debut in Los Angeles on November 9.

Saunders will put his WBO super-middleweight title on the line for the first time after clinching the vacant title over Shefat Isufi in Stevenage earlier this year.

Coceres has won all but one of his 29 professional bouts in the super-welterweight and middleweight divisions and previously claimed Latino and Fedebol titles.

Billy Joe Saunders was WBO middleweight champion for two years but gave up his title in 2017

Saunders said: 'I'm really looking forward to fighting in LA and making my professional American debut.

'Coceres is a tough, world-class operator, an unbeaten fighter and I certainly feel the pressure to out-perform him and look good on such a massive platform.'

Saunders will put his WBO super-middleweight title on the line against the unbeaten Argentine

Saunders' title defence will take place on the undercard of the celebrity bout between YouTube stars KSI and Logan Paul.

The online stars have turned professional for the highly-anticipated rematch and will fight with 10-ounce gloves and without headgear as they headline the show.
description: Saunders will put his WBO super-middleweight title on the line for the first time after clinching the vacant title over Shefat Isufi in Stevenage earlier this year.
